backend/main.mo: Defines the backend’s full data model including users, questions, attempts, results, chapters, categories, notifications, backups, and analytics event types.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata for build tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of various frontend source files describing their purpose, UI roles, and behaviors.
frontend/admin.html: HTML entry point for the admin panel using dark theme, fonts, and loading the admin React bundle.
frontend/docs/admin-api.md: Documentation of admin API endpoints covering questions, content, users, notifications, analytics, feedback, and backup/restore.
frontend/docs/deployment-troubleshooting: Troubleshooting guide for deployment issues like the 'no draft' error with suggested clean deploy steps.
frontend/docs/learner-tests-api.md: Documents learner test APIs including chapter tests, exam mode, auth requirements, parameters, and examples.
frontend/docs/navigation-map.md: Describes the app’s hash-based routing structure, flows for practice and exam modes, and deep linking behavior.
frontend/docs/postgres-ddl.md: Reference PostgreSQL schema outlining tables and relationships mirroring the IC backend data model.
frontend/docs/screen-mockups.md: Provides wireframe-style descriptions of main app screens using the dark glassmorphic design system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts, sets metadata, and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/admin/AdminApp.tsx: Admin app root that checks Internet Identity and admin status before loading either the login screen or admin shell.
frontend/src/admin/analytics/AnalyticsSc: Admin analytics UI allowing date filtering and displaying metrics and event data.
frontend/src/admin/analytics/useAdminAna: Hooks to fetch analytics events and compute derived metrics like users, app opens, and retention.
frontend/src/admin/auth/AdminLoginScreen: Admin login screen using Internet Identity with branded UI and loading states.
frontend/src/admin/backup/BackupRestoreS: UI for backing up and restoring system data with file upload, validation, and confirmation flow.
frontend/src/admin/backup/backupValidati: Validates backup JSON structure by checking required fields and array formats.
frontend/src/admin/backup/useBackupResto: Hooks to trigger backup and restore operations via the actor API with toast feedback.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminShell: Provides the main admin layout with header, sidebar navigation, and route-based content rendering along with logout handling.
frontend/src/admin/components/EnglishTex: Contains all static English text labels and messages used across the admin UI.
frontend/src/admin/content/CategoriesTab: Lists categories with create, edit, and delete actions and opens a form dialog for modifications.
frontend/src/admin/content/CategoryFormD: Dialog form for creating or editing a category using react-hook-form and category mutations.
frontend/src/admin/content/ChapterFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing chapters, including course selection and order input.
frontend/src/admin/content/ChaptersCateg: Wrapper screen with tabs for managing chapters and categories.
frontend/src/admin/content/ChaptersTab.t: Displays the chapter list with add, edit, and delete actions and manages the chapter form dialog.
frontend/src/admin/content/useChaptersCa: Provides React Query hooks to list, create, update, and delete chapters and categories using the backend actor with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/admin/feedback/feedbackExpo: Exports feedback notifications to JSON or CSV by transforming data and triggering file downloads.
frontend/src/admin/feedback/FeedbackInbo: Displays feedback messages, allows JSON/CSV export, and parses feedback fields for rendering.
frontend/src/admin/main.tsx: Bootstraps the admin app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/admin/notifications/Notific: Shows existing notifications and a form to compose and send new notifications to user segments.
frontend/src/admin/notifications/useAdmi: React Query hooks for listing and creating notifications with backend actor and toast feedback.
frontend/src/admin/questions/BulkUploadQ: Handles CSV template download, CSV upload/validation, and bulk question import via backend.
frontend/src/admin/questions/csv/csvPars: CSV parsing helpers that convert raw CSV text into row objects and normalize difficulty and answers.
frontend/src/admin/questions/csv/validat: Validates parsed CSV rows, checking required fields, difficulty, and answer format, returning structured results.
frontend/src/admin/questions/DeleteQuest: Confirmation dialog for deleting a question using a mutation and showing loading states.
frontend/src/admin/questions/QuestionFor: Modal form component for creating or editing questions, handling form state, mutations, and submission.
frontend/src/admin/questions/QuestionsSc: Main questions management UI with filters, search, table display, and dialogs for create/edit/delete.
frontend/src/admin/questions/types.ts: Type definitions for question forms, filters, CSV rows, and validation results.
frontend/src/admin/questions/useQuestion: React Query hooks for searching, creating, updating, deleting, and bulk-uploading questions via backend actor.
frontend/src/admin/routes.ts: Defines admin route constants and human-readable labels for navigation.
Generates CSV data for a user's exam results and provides a helper to trigger CSV downloads.
frontend/src/admin/users/UsersScreen.tsx: UI for listing users, selecting a user, and viewing/exporting their exam history.
frontend/src/admin/users/useUsersResults: React Query hooks to fetch users, user exam history, and export data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling splash, auth flow, profile setup, and route-based screen rendering inside an authenticated shell.
Shows contact links for support with phone and email icons.
frontend/src/components/auth/CreateProfi: Form for completing user profile with name, course, optional exam date, and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/OtpAuthFlow: Handles OTP-based login flow including phone entry, OTP verification, and profile creation for new users.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Renders a branded header with logo, unread notifications, and logout for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: A reusable glass-style card wrapper applying visual effects and custom classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Authentic: Provides a background layout wrapper with animated gradients for authenticated pages.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar with route-based highlighting for home, tests, bookmarks, and profile.
frontend/src/components/progress/Animate: Progress bar that animates value changes with a shimmer effect.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: In-app card showing active reminder settings with dismiss functionality.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays an animated splash screen with brand logo, gradients, and timed fade-out.
frontend/src/components/stats/QuickStats: Displays a Quick Stats card showing total tests, accuracy with progress bar, and weak chapter badges using placeholder data.
frontend/src/config/brand.ts: Defines centralized branding config including logo asset paths, name, tagline, and alt text.
frontend/src/config/viral.ts: Provides share, referral, and feature-flag configuration for viral and utility features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Offers functions to record analytics events when user consent and identity are available, plus an app-open event hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalyticsConsent.t: Manages user analytics consent via localStorage with grant and revoke helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useExamQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for starting exams, fetching questions, submitting exams, and retrieving exam history and reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeedback.ts: Provides hooks to submit feedback via notifications and fetch stored feedback entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Handles simple hash-based routing with state tracking and navigation helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing login state, identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStreak.ts: Tracks daily visit streaks using localStorage and updates streak based on last visit date.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Fetches notifications from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflinePracticeSyn: Syncs offline practice actions from local outbox to backend, retrying on reconnect and periodically.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpSession.ts: Manages OTP auth session by storing token and phone in localStorage with login, logout, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching questions, submitting answers, and managing bookmarks with offline caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query mutations and queries for OTP actions, saving profiles, and fetching the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferralCode.ts: Generates a referral code based on the authenticated user's profile using a React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderSettings.t: Stores and updates reminder-related settings in localStorage with utilities to modify banner state.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebNotifications.t: Handles web notification permissions and provides functions to send test and reminder notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, utilities, gradients, shadows, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/routes.ts: Defines app route constants with paths, labels, descriptions, and legacy aliases.
frontend/src/screens/BookmarksScreen.tsx: Displays bookmarked questions with loading states and navigation to specific practice questions.
frontend/src/screens/ChapterTestScreen.t: Renders the chapter test intro screen with navigation and a start button.
frontend/src/screens/CourseDashboard.tsx: Dashboard showing user greeting, streak, quick stats, reminders, and navigation cards for major app features.
frontend/src/screens/exam/ExamAttemptPan: Renders an exam question view with timer, navigation, answer selection, marking for review, and a submit confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/screens/exam/ExamHistoryPan: Fetches and displays past exam attempts with stats, or shows placeholders when loading or empty.
frontend/src/screens/exam/ExamResultsPan: Shows exam results with score, accuracy, time used, and weak chapter detection, plus actions for review, history, or starting a new exam.
frontend/src/screens/exam/ExamReviewPane: Displays a detailed review of an exam attempt, including question outcomes, selected answers, and navigation back.
frontend/src/screens/exam/ExamStartPanel: Shows exam configuration, rules, and start/history actions based on the selected course.
Implements a circular countdown timer with visual indicators for low and critical time states.
frontend/src/screens/exam/useExamAttempt: Provides state management for an ongoing exam attempt, including navigation, answers, review flags, and payload building.
frontend/src/screens/ExamModeScreen.tsx: Manages exam flow including starting exams, answering questions, submitting results, viewing history, and reviewing past attempts.
frontend/src/screens/FeedbackScreen.tsx: Provides a form for submitting app feedback with subject, message, and optional contact details.
frontend/src/screens/NotificationsScreen: Displays user notifications with loading, empty state, and timestamped notification cards.
Implements chapter-based practice flow with question lists, answering, bookmarking, hints, and offline syncing.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Shows user profile details and settings including notifications, reminders, analytics consent, and logout options.
frontend/src/screens/ProgressScreen.tsx: Displays a progress overview for predefined chapters with animated progress bars and a back-to-dashboard button.
frontend/src/screens/ShareAppScreen.tsx: Provides sharing options via WhatsApp, Web Share API, and clipboard, including referral-code sharing if available.
frontend/src/screens/TestsScreen.tsx: Shows test history header and a placeholder card when no tests are completed, with a button to start practicing.
frontend/src/utils/phone.ts: Contains utilities to validate and normalize phone numbers with basic formatting rules.
frontend/src/utils/practiceCache.ts: Manages localStorage caching for practice questions, bookmarks, and an offline outbox queue.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, radii, shadows, and animation keyframes with typography, container-query, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing full app and admin panel feature requirements, data models, flows, and known deployment issue.
